column4: is there a simple way to echo a command to a running process...  i know in /proc/<process id>/fd you can echo text to a terminal screen but i cant quite get it to work
im looking to run a script(s) to directly interact with a process (command line game server) so im not sure stdin will quite do the trick.  any other ideas?
dont wanna send ya on another wild goose chase.. maybe #bash / #perl / #linux can help
